纽温https://www.neowin.net/ 纽温en-us纽温点火新闻editor@neowin.net（总编辑） Developers@neowin.net（Neowin 开发者） 5新文网https://www.neowin.net/images/pegasus/icon.png https://www.neowin.net BioWare 确认《龙腾世纪：面纱卫士》不会有 Denuvo 或任何第三方 DRM https://www.neowin.net/news/bioware-confirms-dragon-age-the-veilguard-wont-have-denuvo-or-any-third-party-drm/
;;

;;

;;

;;

;;

;;
